name: Pathephone
tag_list: voip, long-distance, telephone, call, local-phone-number, inum, did
overview: Pathephone provides VoIP based phone service using the SIP protocol and broadband Internet. Services include outbound calling to PSTN and to ITSP, personal international telephone number and local phone numbers for inbound calling within the USA, Canada, Mexico, the United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand and some European countries. Pathephone supports SIP VoIP Telephones and Video phones; Windows, Linux, iOS and Android softphones; and IP PBX equipment with authorization by username/password and by IP address.
